source.693c027a:
import pandas as pd

data = pd.read_csv('../input/tsmc-revenue/tsmc_revenue.csv')
data = data.drop('Total',axis=1)
columns_list = data.columns
columns_list = columns_list.to_list()
columns_list[0]='year'
data.columns = columns_list
data = data.fillna(0)

months = ['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','Jul','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec']
for month in months:
    data[month] = data[month].apply(lambda x : str(x).replace(',', ''))
    data[month] = pd.to_numeric(data[month])
    
data['1Q'] = data['Jan'] + data['Feb'] + data['Mar']
data['2Q'] = data['Apr'] + data['May'] + data['Jun']
data['3Q'] = data['Jul'] + data['Aug'] + data['Sep']
data['4Q'] = data['Oct'] + data['Nov'] + data['Dec']
data = data.drop(months,axis=1)
data = data.set_index('year')

year = data.index.to_list()
price = data.to_numpy().flatten()

year_list = []

for i in year:
    if i == 2006:
        year_list.append(i + 0.25)
        year_list.append(i + 0.5)
        year_list.append(i + 0.75)
    elif i == 2021:
        year_list.append(i)
        year_list.append(i + 0.25)
    else:
        year_list.append(i)
        year_list.append(i + 0.25)
        year_list.append(i + 0.5)
        year_list.append(i + 0.75)
        
price = price[1:-2]

data['total'] = data['1Q'] + data['2Q'] + data['3Q'] + data['4Q']
year_total = data['total'].to_list()
for i in range(len(year_total)):
    if i == 0: year_total[i] = year_total[i]/3
    elif i == 15: year_total[i] = year_total[i]/2
    else: year_total[i] = year_total[i]/4
        
data

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

fig, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,13), facecolor="w")
plt.scatter(year_list, price)
plt.plot(year_list, price)
plt.show()

source.96174f9d:
from matplotlib.offsetbox import TextArea, DrawingArea, OffsetImage, AnnotationBbox
import matplotlib.image as mpimg

fig, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,13), facecolor="w")
plt.scatter(year_list, price)
plt.plot(year_list, price)
plt.bar(x=year,height=year_total, alpha = 0.1)
for i in year:
    axes.axvline(i,alpha = 0.1)
    
img = mpimg.imread('../input/tsmc-logo/Tsmc.svg.png')
imagebox = OffsetImage(img, zoom=0.2)
ab = AnnotationBbox(imagebox, (2007, 330000),frameon=False)
axes.add_artist(ab)
plt.xticks(list(range(2006,2022)))
plt.show()
source.816c62a2:
fig, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,13), facecolor="w")
plt.scatter(year_list, price)
plt.plot(year_list, price)
plt.bar(x=year,height=year_total, alpha = 0.1)
for i in year:
    axes.axvline(i,alpha = 0.1)
    
img = mpimg.imread('../input/tsmc-logo/Tsmc.svg.png')
imagebox = OffsetImage(img, zoom=0.2)
ab = AnnotationBbox(imagebox, (2007, 330000),frameon=False)
axes.add_artist(ab)
plt.xticks(list(range(2006,2022)))
axes.axvspan(2013.5, 2015,ymax=0.6, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2016, 2017.8,ymax=0.75, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2019, 2021.5,ymax=0.97, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)

plt.show()

fig, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,13), facecolor="w")
plt.scatter(year_list, price)
plt.plot(year_list, price)
plt.bar(x=year,height=year_total, alpha = 0.1)
for i in year:
    axes.axvline(i,alpha = 0.1)
    
img = mpimg.imread('../input/tsmc-logo/Tsmc.svg.png')
imagebox = OffsetImage(img, zoom=0.2)
ab = AnnotationBbox(imagebox, (2007, 330000),frameon=False)
axes.add_artist(ab)
plt.xticks(list(range(2006,2022)))
plt.text(s="1st increase", x=2014.25, y= 250000,va='center',ha='center')
plt.text(s="Cloud Inovation", x=2016.9, y= 300000,va='center',ha='center')
plt.text(s="AI / Big Data Inovation", x=2020.25, y= 390000,va='center',ha='center')

axes.axvspan(2013.5, 2015,ymax=0.6, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2016, 2017.8,ymax=0.75, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2019, 2021.5,ymax=0.97, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)

plt.show()
source.582efa43:
import matplotlib.font_manager as fm
font = fm.FontProperties(fname='../input/myfont/210 Black.ttf')

fig, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,13), facecolor="w")
plt.scatter(year_list, price)
plt.plot(year_list, price)
plt.bar(x=year,height=year_total, alpha = 0.1)
for i in year:
    axes.axvline(i,alpha = 0.1)
    
img = mpimg.imread('../input/tsmc-logo/Tsmc.svg.png')
imagebox = OffsetImage(img, zoom=0.2)
ab = AnnotationBbox(imagebox, (2007, 330000),frameon=False)
axes.add_artist(ab)
plt.xticks(list(range(2006,2022)))
plt.text(s="1st increase", x=2014.25, y= 250000,va='center',ha='center', font = font, fontsize=16)
plt.text(s="Cloud Inovation", x=2016.9, y= 300000,va='center',ha='center', font = font, fontsize=16)
plt.text(s="AI / Big Data Inovation", x=2020.25, y= 390000,va='center',ha='center', font = font, fontsize=16)

axes.axvspan(2013.5, 2015,ymax=0.6, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2016, 2017.8,ymax=0.75, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2019, 2021.5,ymax=0.97, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)

plt.gca().spines['right'].set_visible(False)
plt.gca().spines['top'].set_visible(False)

plt.xticks(font=font, fontsize=12)
plt.yticks(font=font, fontsize=12)

plt.show()
source.da4e827f:
import matplotlib.font_manager as fm
font = fm.FontProperties(fname='../input/myfont/210 Black.ttf')

fig, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(20,13), facecolor="w")
plt.scatter(year_list, price)
plt.plot(year_list, price)
plt.bar(x=year,height=year_total, alpha = 0.1)
for i in year:
    axes.axvline(i,alpha = 0.2)
    
img = mpimg.imread('../input/tsmc-logo/Tsmc.svg.png')
imagebox = OffsetImage(img, zoom=0.2)
ab = AnnotationBbox(imagebox, (2007, 330000),frameon=False)
axes.add_artist(ab)
plt.xticks(list(range(2006,2022)))
plt.text(s="1st increase", x=2014.25, y= 250000,va='center',ha='center', font = font, fontsize=16)
plt.text(s="Cloud Inovation", x=2016.9, y= 300000,va='center',ha='center', font = font, fontsize=16)
plt.text(s="AI / Big Data Inovation", x=2020.25, y= 390000,va='center',ha='center', font = font, fontsize=16)

axes.axvspan(2013.5, 2015,ymax=0.6, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2016, 2017.8,ymax=0.75, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)
axes.axvspan(2019, 2021.5,ymax=0.97, fc="olive", alpha=0.3)

plt.gca().spines['right'].set_visible(False)
plt.gca().spines['top'].set_visible(False)

plt.title("TSMC's revenue", font = font, fontsize= 40)

plt.xticks(font=font, fontsize=12)
plt.yticks(font=font, fontsize=12)


plt.show()
